name: Caramba!
description: In this game, you have to train your memory and find the treasures of the captain.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP3 Processor: Intel Atom 1.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel I3 or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
